body_html: We should probably set up pylint and make it run at each pull request. This way we can slowly make ourselves more pep8 compliant and eventually we'll just go over the whole codebase and fix all errors. I'm using vim, I'll get myself some linter plugin tomorrow.

body: We should probably set up pylint and make it run at each pull request. This way we can slowly make ourselves more pep8 compliant and eventually we'll just go over the whole codebase and fix all errors. I'm using vim, I'll get myself some linter plugin tomorrow.
